text:
The link in “Parameters available for all modules” table to  export_to_template_context is a dev link
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-module-syntax-and-parameters>

<http://developers-web1-HubSpot.sites.HubSpot.com/export-to-template-context?hsLang=en>
<@UBFA10FMF> would you mind taking a look when you have a moment?

there are some workarounds needed to get  file manager files to work with the local hubl server. for one, when referencing local files they need to be prefixed with `/file_manager/path/to/file`. they also need to be within the folder specified by `templateBaseDir` in your `config.yaml`. So the directory structure is a little inconsistent with the structure you see in FTP (local hubl server changes don't always keep up well with changes to other tools)
